price: Lalle ne haƙĩƙa abin kula yã kasance a cikin ƙissoshinsu ga masu hankali. Bai kasance wani ƙirƙiran lãbãri ba kuma amma shi gaskatãwa ne ga, abin da yake a gaba gare shi, da rarrabẽwar dukan abũbuwa, da shiriya da rahama ga mutãne waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni.
arabic: لَقَدۡ كَانَ فِي قَصَصِهِمۡ عِبۡرَةٞ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِۗ مَا كَانَ حَدِيثٗا يُفۡتَرَىٰ وَلَٰكِن تَصۡدِيقَ ٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَتَفۡصِيلَ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna fī qaṣaṣihim ʿib'ratun li-ulī al-albābi mā kāna ḥadīthan yuf'tarā walākin taṣdīqa alladhī bayna yadayhi watafṣīla kulli shayin wahudan waraḥmatan liqawmin yu'minūna
